name: DailyParentingTips
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Most parenting tips, books and classes out there focus on the child. They offer advice on how to control specific behaviors through various discipline strategies that promise compliance and obedience.

This is different.

This journey will set you on a completely different path.

A path of peace, love, understanding, compassion, and acceptance.

A path back to your own intuition.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
